verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Silent night, holy night!
All is calm, and all is bright
Round yon Virgin, Mother and Child
Holy infant so tender and mild

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Sleep in heavenly peace
Sleep in heavenly peace

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Malam kudus, sunyi senyap,
bintang-Mu gemerlap
Jurus'lamat manusia,
ada datang di dunia

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
Kristus Anak Daud,
Kristus Anak Daud
